Block.Text: {C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}And when you recruit Warriors or link with Pokémon that are registered in the Gallery, the data you have built up with them will be carried over. {End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}By the way...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}This is how the Gallery looks at the moment, |02,cc{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}You're sure to meet a lot more Warriors and Pokémon in the future.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}And I know that eventually, the day that you return to center stage will come, |02,cc{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}I look forward to seeing you again soon!{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,cc{C1}! There's someone here to see you.{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Ah, {Name}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:31}I'm sorry to turn up out of the blue like this, but I'd like to ask you a favor.{End}

{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}From what I've seen, the Pokémon really seem to take a shine to you. So I was thinking I'd find it easier to meet some on my travels if I were with you.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:31}I guess what I'm trying to say is...would you let me join your army?{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh, and it's not just me actually. I have a friend who feels the same way...{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{Name}{C1}... I've seen you fight. You're good.{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:31}And Ransei is under threat from this dark wave of evil. I want to watch you resist against it. Firsthand.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}|02,cc{C1}, these are two of Ransei's most famous Warriors...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}This is a real endorsement of your leadership!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Motochika{Color:33} and {Color:31}Motonari{Color:33} are now your allies!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Motochika{Color:33} and {Color:31}Motonari{Color:33} have been deployed in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Motochika{Color:33} has been deployed in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Motonari{Color:33} has been deployed in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You have downloaded the Motochika and Motonari event. In order to make them your allies, you will need somewhere to deploy them.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Motochika and Motonari event... {C1}In order to make them your allies, you will need somewhere to deploy them.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You have downloaded the Motochika and Motonari event. Proceed with your game, and try to catch their attention!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:32}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:33}|02,cc{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:1016}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh dear... Did you lose to {Name2}{C1} again?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:33}Wh-Who are you?!{End}
{C1}{Char:1016}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Why, I sell ponigiri over there! Here, take this one. It'll make you feel better!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You received a {Color:32}purple ponigiri{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}All Warriors' Pokémon now have maximum Energy.{End}
{C1}{Char:1016}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh dear, you lost again? Well, never mind. Give this to your Pokémon―it's sure to cheer them up!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The region of Ransei...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}For many years, it had witnessed relentless fighting between rival Warriors, all of whom were seeking the elusive legendary Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}These increasingly brutal battles were causing the Warriors' own Pokémon to grow weary.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Then one day, in the northern kingdom of {Color:31}Dragnor{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Their ambition has corrupted them... They use their Pokémon as mere tools...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And this legendary Pokémon... It is surely no more than a myth...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}{Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33} will prove it.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}I shall bring the whole of Ransei under my control, and if the legendary Pokémon does not appear before me...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Then I will have brought dawn to Ransei's long, dark night.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}...And even if this creature does exist, {Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33} shall be hailed as its vanquisher!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Hehehe... Hahahaha!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And so the truth is revealed.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Hehe... Hehehe...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Hahahahaha!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}The legends were true.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}And I am the only man that has seen the legendary Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And you... You are that Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You should go.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}If I bring you with me... Then the world will know of your existence.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Death comes to us all.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Once it has taken {Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33}, the battles that raged around you would begin again.{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}I do not want that to happen.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And so, Arceus left...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Upon hearing that the {Color:34}legendary Pokémon{Color:33} did not exist, most {Color:34}Warriors{Color:33} lost the will to go on fighting.{End}

{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}In time, however, a number of them came to appreciate the joy of {Color:34}battle{Color:33} for its own sake, without concern for the quest for the {Color:34}legendary{Color:33} {Color:34}Pokémon{Color:33}.{End}

{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And so, the true meaning of {Color:34}battle{Color:33}, and the joy provided by the bond between Warrior and Pokémon, was finally rediscovered in the land of {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Times were changing...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Central Ransei was entering a period more opulent than any it had seen before.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The beauty of its female Warlords had become famous...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And there was a growing clamor to find out who was the fairest of them all...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}The other kingdom's Warlords are all so famous...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}And I'm just nothing by comparison...{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Oh my. Aren't we modest?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Huh...? Y-You are...{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Seven Warlords... All women...{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}There's only one thing left to decide...{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Who will be Queen of Ransei?{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Q-Queen...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}You may not want to do it.{End}
{C1}{Char:0015}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}But I think your allies probably believe you have what it takes...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}All right.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}I don't believe any of this Ransei's Greatest Beauty stuff that everyone's talking about...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}But I will do what I can for those who believe in me.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Challenge accepted!{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}I-I...won...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}But it's not about who comes first...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}It's about everyone having fun, doing battle together. That's the most important thing.{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Having said that...{End}
{C1}{Char:0002}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}I am really happy!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And so Oichi defeated the other female Warlords,{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}and became known forever as the Rose of {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Ransei region...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Known for the constant battles that raged across its 17 kingdoms.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}In the kingdom of {Color:31}Ignis{Color:33}, situated in the corner of this land...{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You know, I've been thinking...{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Ransei is full of people and full of Pokémon, right?{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}But it's only some people―Warriors―that can communicate with Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Don't you think it'd be great if everyone could make friends with Pokémon? What a happy world that would be!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}It's the kind of world I've always dreamed of!{End}
{C1}{Char:0019}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}It's impossible.{End}
{C1}{Char:0019}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The number of people blessed with the ability to communicate with Pokémon will always be limited.{End}
{C1}{Char:0018}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:32}Aw, {Color:31}Kanbei{Color:33}... You're always such a downer...{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Yeah... I'll show ya!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Now, the storybooks say that this world was created by a legendary Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And they also say that the one who captures all 17 castles gets to see this Pokémon, right?{End}
{C1}{Char:0019}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You're not...{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Yeah! I am!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}I'm gonna summon the legendary Pokémon, and together we're gonna change this world!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I did it... I finally did it...{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Huh?{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Wh-What's that...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0018}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Lord {Color:31}Hideyoshi{Color:33}... Isn't that...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}It's here! The legendary Pokémon!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}It won't be long now! Soon we'll have a world where all people can live happily together with Pokémon!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And from that moment on...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:34}Ransei{Color:33} was united under Hideyoshi's leadership, and conflict was banished from the region.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}As a result, it became easier for {Color:34}Pokémon{Color:33} and people to understand one another.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The fact that this change was brought about through the power of Arceus, however, was known to no one...{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}In the region of Ransei...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}, Warlord of {Color:30}Dragnor{Color:33}, had conquered ten kingdoms.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}His influence had almost reached the kingdom of {Color:31}Fontaine{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Hehe... How feeble. If uniting Ransei is really going to be this easy...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Then very soon it shall all be mine!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Hehehe... Hahahaha!{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}So he's coming...{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}{Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}... The one who has the power to create an era of his own... To unite this region...{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Well, he won't sweep me away that easily.{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}...Three years.{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Within three years, I will have driven {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} away.{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}I will be the one who leaves my mark on Ransei!{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I did it... I drove {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} away...{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}But there will be a second {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33}. And a third...{End}
{C1}{Char:0004}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I must defeat all of them. I must continue to resist tyranny in all its forms.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And so Motochika defeated Nobunaga.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}He stood firm against the dark tide and showed great courage and skill in {Color:34}battle{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Indeed, his talents were already becoming too great for the borders of {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33} to contain...{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Times were changing...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Central Ransei was entering a period more opulent than any it had seen before.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The beauty of its female Warlords had become famous...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And there was a growing clamor to find out who was the fairest of them all...{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}This contest... You're not happy about it, are you, {Color:31}Ginchiyo{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Of course not.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Being the fairest and mightiest woman is of no interest to me.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}But if I must go through this before Ransei can be united in my name... {Wait:30}20{Color:31}Muneshige{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}What is it?{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}You are not to get involved in these battles. My own powers alone shall be enough.{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}Hmm... {Wait:30}20Very well.{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Then I shall take a little trip.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}As you wish.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:33}The people of Ransei shall soon learn the name of our clan. It is our destiny...{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:33}These battles must be won!{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Central Ransei is under my command...{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}And yet ten more kingdoms remain. The path ahead is long and hard...{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Hmm. That doesn't sound like you.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}{Color:31}Muneshige{Color:33}... You're back.{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}I am. I wanted to see your face again, {Color:31}Ginchiyo{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}I... You... Cease your tomfoolery!{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}There may be ten kingdoms left for you to conquer, but the armies that protect them are nothing special.{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}It is only a matter of time before you unite this region, {Color:31}Ginchiyo{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:33}I-I know that!{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Ha... {End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}It would appear that you still do not need me, then. I shall take my leave.{End}
{C1}{Char:0005}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}Wh-Where are you going?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0020}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Wherever the wind may take me, I suppose.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And so Ginchiyo, who had won the contest among the female Warlords,{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}set her sights on the whole of {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33}, and steeled herself for the battles that lay ahead...{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Name}{C1} had successfully united Ransei...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And returned all its castles to their original owners.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}In {Color:31}Greenleaf{Color:33}, however, {Color:31}Motonari{Color:33} had something on his mind...{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}I know this is a bit sudden...{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}But it's no secret that I've always wanted to be a Pokémon researcher.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}To that end...I want to expand my horizons and meet some new Pokémon.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}In order to do so, of course, I shall need an army...{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}I take it there are no objections?{End}
{C1}{Char:0089}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}L-Lord {Color:31}Motonari{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}What is it?{End}
{C1}{Char:0088}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Y-You're not going to try and conquer Ransei?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0088}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}I never thought I'd ever hear you say such a thing!{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Oh no, certainly not.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}My only aim is to link with some new Pokémon. Let's say...a hundred or so.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}I hope you can help me achieve this goal!{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Well, it looks like I managed to reach my target. One hundred Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I've met all sorts of different ones along the way...{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}But I'm sure there are some Pokémon that I still haven't come across...{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}What an exciting thought!{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}...But it can wait for tomorrow.{End}
{C1}{Char:0006}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}For now, I think I had better take a rest.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And so Motonari successfully gathered one hundred {Color:34}Pokémon{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}and was able to spend the rest of his days happily engrossed in his research.{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}In the region of Ransei...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33}, Warlord of {Color:31}Dragnor{Color:33}, had been instigating a series of increasingly brutal battles,{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}and now had eleven kingdoms under his command.{End}
